mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, dog_size, enabled, authority) values (#{user_id},#{user_name},#{user_password},#{user_phone},#{dog_size},1,'ROLE_USER')
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, dog_size, enabled, authority from users where user_id=#{user_id}
